snippet: Revered as fierce horsemen who once secured an empire’s frontier, Cossacks are gaining an increasing role in law enforcement in a newly conservative, nationalist Russia.
abstract: Cossacks, once revered as fierce horsemen who secured frontier of Russian empire, are gaining increasing role in law enforcement; Pres Vladimir V Putin has fostered development of conservative, nationalist ideology in his third term and Cossacks have emerged as kind of mascot, with growing financial and political support.
lead_paragraph: Revered as fierce horsemen who once secured an empire’s frontier, Cossacks are gaining an increasing role in law enforcement in a newly conservative, nationalist Russia.

headline.seo: Cossacks Are Back in Russia. May the Hills Tremble.
headline.main: The Cossacks Are Back. May the Hills Tremble.
headline.print_headline: The Cossacks Are Back. May the Hills Tremble.
